::KitKat::

She turned and looked at Land Mine.  "Why don't you go tot he CR 
chamber and get Time Bomb's spark out of his body.  I know it doesn't 
hold him any more, but in keeping it close to you, you can keep a 
part of him close to you."  She smiled and put a reasurring hand on 
Lind Mine's shoulder. "Go and get it.  Or you can wait a little bit 
and I can get it for you, just as soon as I help take care of these 
slagging maximals."
